## Employee Attrition Analysis 
Analyze and predict employee turnover using data analytics and machine learning.

## üìù Summary
Employee attrition, or turnover, is a critical challenge for organizations, impacting costs and efficiency. This project uses data analytics and machine learning to identify patterns in employee attrition, predict at-risk employees, and provide actionable insights. By understanding key factors like job satisfaction, work environment, and personal demographics, this analysis helps organizations make data-driven decisions to improve retention strategies and foster employee satisfaction.

## üîß Tools & Technologies
Python: Data analysis and machine learning
Pandas, NumPy: Data manipulation
Matplotlib, Seaborn: Data visualization
Scikit-learn: Model building
Jupyter Notebook: Development environment
